comments.author: m2017
comments.body: "What is bitcoin for you?"I find it difficult to single out just one thing in bitcoin. For me, it is like a multifunctional financial tool, the application of which will differ depending on the situation and goals.In the long term, bitcoin is a speculative instrument (still, at some point all will sell this or part of it) combining the function of a bank (savings) deposit and a protective asset against inflation.In the short term - electronic international (quoted in any country) digital money (with solvency restrictions due to the small number of sellers accepting this currency), allowing you to pay or transfer in a matter of minutes (if the meme-pool is not overloaded).In terms of independence and privacy, this is a tool that gives financial independence and freedom from any third parties (governments, banks) and maintains confidentiality (subject to a number of measures) of financial activities.

And I am very confident and optimistic that in the future the price of Bitcoin will be much higher and also provide many benefits for me, because as long as I have Bitcoin I feel many good benefits, especially from a financial perspective. So in my opinion, while I was involved in Bitcoin, I got a lot of benefits and also very valuable experiences that I had never had or experienced before. comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: wez on May 01, 2024, 08:46:44 AMGive me your best answers, videos, urls, stories, anythingfor me it is the history, people connected to it, the community and everything surrounding it.The increase in the rate of criminal activities in my location which includes kidnapping for ransom is a source of concern to many people. It has also been discovered that these criminals get information about the worth of their targets from bank officials. Bitcoin's privacy is an option for hiding how much you are worth from the public space. So Bitcoin for me is a good way to be anonymous.The rate at which my local currency is losing its value due to inflation is also alarming. Bitcoin seems to be a good hedge over inflation. It is better to save your funds in Bitcoin than to keep it at the mercy of an inflation-prone local currency. Bitcoin is a viable means of saving for the future.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Bitcoin means different things to different people. For some, Bitcoin is digital currency and should be used as such. For many, it is an investment - an asset they can use to hedge inflation and hopefully make profits in the future. For others, Bitcoin is freedom from the system - freedom from financial institutions and governments. For crypto traders, Bitcoin is a tool for trading on the crypto market. And for me, Bitcoin means all of these things.
